I am an associate professor in management at the [Bartlett School of Sustainable Construction](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/bartlett/construction/) at [University College London](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/). My research interests include social networks, organizational design, strategy, and organisational behaviour.

Before joining UCL, I was a research associate at Imperial Business Analytics, part of the [Imperial Data Science Institute](https://www.imperial.ac.uk/data-science/) and [Imperial College Business School](https://www.imperial.ac.uk/business-school/).
